name: toner-globe
description: MapLibre GL JS Globe Toner Site centered on Bishkek, Kyrgyzstan with Japanese labels and monochromatic design

scripts.style:generate: pkl eval -f json style-generation/style.pkl > public/style.json && cp public/style.json docs/style.json
scripts.style:simple: pkl eval -f json style-generation/simple-style.pkl > public/style.json && cp public/style.json docs/style.json
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add docs && git commit -m 'Deploy to GitHub Pages' && git push origin main
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands: dev, build, preview, style:generate, style:simple, deploy, clean, serve, lint:style'

author: optgeo
